... God, without substance, as an object of|faith only, is a real crisis... What is truly|needed is a God who is the protector of the|
|world...

The four star circuits of the heavens are|intended to elevate the heroes in human form|to divine heights, and to steel their|
|souls...

Since time immemorial, we angels have|gathered the souls of heroes from different|eras, in search of possible candidates for|
|the new God...

165.「すべては 天星郷に伝わる 秘儀をもちいて| 英雄を神化させるための 営みであっ: Everything was done to deify the hero using a|secret ritual handed down in the Celestial|City...

166.「近日 とりおこなわれる 神化の儀を経て| 諸君は アストルティアを守る| 神々: In a ceremony to be performed shortly, you|will be inducted into the ranks of the gods|who protect Astoltia...

167.「新たなる神……うすうす そんなことだろうと| 感じておりましたわ……。: A new god... I had an inkling that that was|what you meant...

The four stars of the heavens to determine|their qualities... You have all passed with|flying colors. "and I see all of you as|
|worthy of the divine...

You will have time to think... And after you|have agreed to undergo the rite of|apotheosis, we will light the last flame on|

184.「そうでしょうか……| 私は 似ていると思うのですが……。: I doubt that... I think they are similar...

If what was dropped by the demon that|appeared at the water source and what was|attached to Alvide's left hand are the|
|same...

188.「気味が悪い……。まるで 神化の儀を| さまたげようとする 意思が働いてるかのよ: It's creepy... It's as if there's some kind|of will to prevent the ritual of|apotheosis...

191.「アルビデを このままにしておくのは| 心苦しいですが いったん ここを出ましょ: It pains me to leave Arvide here like this,|but I'm going to leave now...

218.「昨日は 調査に つきあっていただき| ありがとうございました。: Thank you for coming along with us yesterday|to investigate...

|ascend the ladder to God...

This divine flame, which is your spiritual|alter ego and catalyst for your|divinization... "Take the flame of divinity|
|into yourselves...

258.「オレは このチカラで……| みずからの過ちを 正してみせよう。| ドワチャッカ:
I'll use this power... I will use this|power... to right my wrongs... I will restore|the Dwachatka continent to its rightful|
|place...

260.「ドワチャッカ大陸を あるべき姿にィ！| ボク……ワクワクしてきたよぉおおおッ！: I want Dwachatka to be what it should be!|I'm... I'm excited!

261.「大切なものを ただ 守りたかった……。 | だからこそ 己のすべてを かけて|: I just wanted to protect what was important|to me. That's why he risked everything to|challenge the King of Mischief alone.

But what do you think? My friends are dead,|my country is ruined! If resisting only|prolongs the pain... Then why don't I just|
|end it myself from the beginning?

263.「ああ……我が身を満たす 甘美なるチカラ。| なんと すばらしい！: Oh... Fill me with sweetness... How|wonderful!

265.「人類なぞ 大魔王に 滅ぼされるべきだった。| あの戦いを生き抜いた 兄貴なら: The human race must be destroyed by the Great|Satan. You're the one who survived that|battle. You know what I'm talking about.

266.「ああ……イヤというほど 思い知った。| ひとりひとりは 善でも 群れると悪にな:
Oh... I've been thinking about it a lot. "One|by one, we're good, but in a group, we're|bad. And when there's peace, they fight|
|amongst themselves.

267.「共通の敵がいるうちは 結束してたのに……。: We were united as long as we had a common|enemy...

268.「人間ってのは つくづく 度しがたいね。| このチカラで 世界を一変させよう。: I'm so impressed with human beings... We have|the power to change the world...

|it...

276.「そうだな……。神のチカラの一端を| 見せてやる。その身で味わえば| お前も こ: Well... I'm going to show you something of|God's power. You're gonna want a taste of|that power.

278.「こんな俺に 過ぎたチカラを与え| 見せかけの希望を 与えようとする| 天使ども: I am disgusted by the angels who try to give|me the pretense of hope by giving me powers|that are too much for me...

279.「手に入れたチカラで 愚かなる天使どもに| 鉄槌を下す！ お前も 手を貸してくれ: With the power I now possess, I will bring|down the hammer on these foolish angels! I|need your help, too!

280.「どうした 怖れているのか？| この神秘を体験すれば 世界が 一変するぞ。| 迷:
What's wrong? Are you afraid? If you|experience this mystery, your world will be|transformed... Lost... If you experience|
|it...

281.「そうだな……。神のチカラの一端を| 見せてやる。その身で味わえば| お前も こ: Well... I'm going to show you something of|God's power. You're gonna want a taste of|that power.

282.「神のチカラを見せると 言いながら| このざまでは 立つ瀬がないな。: They say they're going to show us the power|of God, but this is no way to stand...

283.「お前ほどの剛の者に 神のチカラを| 欲する気持ちを 抱かせるには| もっと 本: It takes a lot more than that to make a man|as strong as you feel the desire for the|power of God...

284.「見るがいい！ <cs_pchero>！| これが 神のチカラだ！！: Look at that!<cs_pchero>I'm not! This is the power of God!

285.「な……なんという 禍々しさだ。| あんなものが まともな神であろうはずがない。: What the... How ill-favored... How could such|a thing be a proper god...

286.「あれは 悪しき神……悪神だ！！: That's the evil god... That's the evil god!

287.「どうだ？ ほしくなってきたろう。| この すばらしき 神のチカラぁあああ！！: What do you think? I'm starting to want|one... The wonderful power of God!

289.「その身に刻まねば わからぬか。| 神のチカラ とくと 味わうがいい！| 必ずや: I have to engrave it on my body to|understand... Just the power of God. You will|be charmed!

290.「神化の儀は 失敗だったのでしょうか。| 手順にのっとって おこなったのに……。: The ritual of deification was a failure... I|did everything according to procedure.

292.「確かなのは 英雄たちが 邪悪な何かに| 変質してしまった ことだけだ。: What is certain is that our heroes have been|transformed into something evil...

294.「そんな！ 復活させるのに| あれだけ 苦労したんですよ！: Oh, no! We worked so hard to revive it!

295.「やむをえまい……ラダ・ガートを 魂に戻す。: We have no choice... Lada Gert, the soul...

296.「以前は こんな色ではなかった……。| この にごりを 除去しないかぎり| 復活: It was never this color before... Unless we|can remove this stain, we can't bring it|back...

297.「我々は とんでもないものを| 世に 解き放ってしまいました。| 悪神を野放しに: We've unleashed some terrible things on the|world. We can't just let the bad guys run|wild...

298.「……何が 言いたい？: ... What do you want to say?

299.「ただちに <cs_pchero>に| 神化の儀をおこない 神となさしめましょう: immediately<cs_pchero>He will perform the ritual of deification and|make him a god... "and send them on their way|to defeat the evil gods...

300.「バカを言え！ 悪神を 増やすだけだ。| 失敗の原因だって わかってないんだぞ。: Speak nonsense! More bad gods... You don't|even know what you're doing.

301.「この者と 他の英雄には ひとつ大きな| ちがいがあります。それは 生者であるこ: There's one big difference between this one|and the other heroes... He is a living man...

302.「生者の魂なら 神化の儀に| 成功するのでは ないでしょうか。: If they are living souls, wouldn't they have|succeeded in their apotheosis...

303.「手を こまねいていても| 状況は悪くなる 一方です 天使長！: All your fiddling will only make things|worse, chief angel!

304.「……ダメだ。許可できない。| まずは ラダ・ガートの魂を調べ| にごりの原因を: ...... With your permission... First, we must|examine Lada Gert's soul to determine the|cause of the smudging...

305.「その過程で なぜ 神化の儀が| 失敗に終わったのかが 見えてくるかもしれん。: In the process, we may discover why the|ritual of deification failed...

306.「何ひとつ わからぬまま 儀式を強行しても| いたずらに 傷口を 広げるだけだし: Forcing them to go through with the ritual|without knowing what they're doing is only|going to cause more wounds.

307.「神化の儀は ひとまず 中断とする。| 皆 それぞれの 持ち場に戻るように。|: The apotheosis ceremony is suspended for the|time being. Everyone will return to their|posts. Until further notice.

309.「最悪な状況の中で よく ラダ・ガートを| 無力化してくれた。私から 礼をさせて: How did you manage to neutralize Lada Gert in|the worst possible circumstances? Let me|thank you...

310.「……フォステイルが ついに| 姿を現さなかったのも 気になるな。| こちらも: ... I also noticed that Foster's never showed|up. I'll have to deal with that later.

311.「ゆくえをくらませた 悪神どもが| おとなしく しているはずがない。| 遠からず: The wicked gods that have gone astray should|be quiet... And in the days to come, they|will bring misery to the world.

312.「我々も 悪神のゆくえを 全力で追う。| 彼らのゆくえが つかめたときは お前も:
We will do everything in our power... to find|out what the evil gods are up to. And when we|find out what they're up to, you, as one of|
|our heroes, are going to help us...

315.「そして ルティアナ様までが 世を去られた。| ここに至り 我らは 四天の星巡り: And even Lutyana has left the world. We are|now obliged to go ahead with the four star|tour and the apotheosis ceremony...

316.「天使の誘いに乗り 天星郷に導かれたのが| そもそもの 誤りだったのだ。| なぜ: It was a mistake to be lured by an angel to|the celestial world in the first place...|Because... I'm not a hero...

317.「無邪気に 夢を追い求めた 結果| 娘や仲間が 犠牲となり果て のうのうと| 自: He chased his dreams so innocently that his|daughters and friends were sacrificed, and he|was the only one who lived to tell the tale.

318.「名君と呼ばれて 歴史に名を刻んだが……| 他者の犠牲の上に あぐらをかく 愚か:
You may have been called a "great lord," and|you may have made your mark on history...|What kind of a fool rests on his laurels at|
|the expense of others? What a hero, Lada|Gert!

319.「だが 加減を誤って 命を奪ってしまう| やもしれぬ。その時は 恨んでくれるなよ: But if you make the mistake of adding or|subtracting, you could end up taking a life.|If that happens, don't hate me!

320.「天使の誘いに乗り 天星郷に導かれたのが| そもそもの 誤りだったのだ。| なぜ: It was a mistake to be lured by an angel to|the celestial world in the first place...|Because... I'm not a hero...

321.「無邪気に 夢を追い求めた 結果| 娘や仲間が 犠牲となり果て のうのうと| 自: He chased his dreams so innocently that his|daughters and friends were sacrificed, and he|was the only one who lived to tell the tale.

322.「名君と呼ばれて 歴史に名を刻んだが……| 他者の犠牲の上に あぐらをかく 愚か:
You may have been called a "great lord," and|you may have made your mark on history...|What kind of a fool rests on his laurels at|
|the expense of others? What a hero, Lada|Gert!

323.「だが 加減を誤って 命を奪ってしまう| やもしれぬ。その時は 恨んでくれるなよ: But if you make the mistake of adding or|subtracting, you could end up taking a life.|If that happens, don't hate me!
